mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKLIST ( BOOKID, BOOKNAME, UNITPRICE, AUTHOR, PUBLISHER, RELEASEDATE, TOTALPAGE, DESCRIPTION, CAREGORY, UNITSINSTOCK, SITUATION ) VALUES ( #{bookid}, #{bookname}, #{unitprice}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{releasedate}, #{totalpages}, #{description}, #{category}, #{unitsinstock}, #{situation} )
